title: Ticket #2340: Globus gss_assist API used without activation
description:
In condor_auth_x509, it is possible to use the gss_assist calls without activating the module. In many cases, using Globus without activating is OK, but it is possible to trigger badness.

In particular, I triggered this (see gdb backtrace below; I was breaking on globus_module_activate); if you use LCMAPS via gsi-authz.conf, it will properly activate/deactivate gss_assist. When it deactivates gss_assist, it zeros out a mutex (which is initialized statically, I think), causing any subsequent call to Globus to segfault.

It's likely I'm the only Condor user in the universe to hit this, but my dev box is approximately what we want the OSG production servers to look like in December.
